quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
name: Julia Morgan

quote: We shape our buildings; thereafter they shape us.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: All real education is the architecture of the soul.
name: William Bennett

quote: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Architecture starts when you carefully put two bricks together. There it begins.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Less is more.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Infrastructure is much more important than architecture.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Architecture is about experience: not only visual but also what you can touch, what you can feel.
name: Ma Yansong

quote: Chicago's one of the rare places where architecture is more visible.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: Architecture is the learned game, correct and magnificent, of forms assembled in the light.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: A house is a machine for living in.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: Rome has not seen a modern building in more than half a century. It is a city frozen in time.
name: Richard Meier

quote: The future of architecture is culture.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Buildings should serve people, not the other way around.
name: John Portman

quote: I believe that the way people live can be directed a little by architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: A dress is a piece of ephemeral architecture, designed to enhance the proportions of the female body.
name: Christian Dior

quote: You have to accept as an architect to be exposed to criticism. Architecture should not rely on full harmony.
name: Renzo Piano

quote: We are called to be architects of the future, not its victims.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: I don't build in order to have clients. I have clients in order to build.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Prose is architecture, not interior decoration, and the Baroque is over.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Architecture is inhabited sculpture.
name: Constantin Brancusi

quote: A building has integrity just like a man. And just as seldom.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Architecture is the reaching out for the truth.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: We have to base architecture on the environment.
name: Toyo Ito

quote: Architecture is the art of how to waste space.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Consider the momentous event in architecture when the wall parted and the column became.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: I try to give people a different way of looking at their surroundings. That's art to me.
name: Maya Lin

quote: My buildings will be my legacy... they will speak for me long after I'm gone.
name: Julia Morgan

quote: Architecture begins when you place two bricks carefully together.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: To create architecture is to put in order. Put what in order? Function and objects.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: If architecture is frozen music then music must be liquid architecture.
name: Quincy Jones

quote: The building's identity resided in the ornament.
name: Louis Sullivan

quote: I don't want to do architecture that's dry and dull.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: Architecture is unnecessarily difficult. It's very tough.
name: Zaha Hadid

quote: Architecture belongs to culture, not to civilization.
name: Alvar Aalto

quote: I don't divide architecture, landscape and gardening; to me they are one.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: Architects of grandeur are often the master builders of disillusionment.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: In architecture you should live for 150 years, because you have to learn in the first 75 years.
name: Renzo Piano

quote: Architecture is measured against the past; you build in the future, and you try to imagine the future.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: My house is my refuge, an emotional piece of architecture, not a cold piece of convenience.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: I like the architecture of lingerie.
name: Colleen Atwood

quote: The speed of change makes you wonder what will become of architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Architecture is about public space held by buildings.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Architecture is invention.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Architecture is the story of how we see ourselves. It is the architect's job to service everyday life.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: I want to abolish time, especially in the contemplation of architecture.
name: Piet Mondrian

quote: I really love Miami, but I don't think the architecture matches the city. It's a bit too commercial.
name: Zaha Hadid

quote: The only job that was ever of interest to me other than filmmaking is architecture.
name: Christopher Nolan

quote: I'm a designer, which includes interiors, architecture, fashion, furniture, and lifestyle.
name: Kelly Wearstler

quote: Modern architecture needed to be part of an evolutionary, not a revolutionary, process.
name: I. M. Pei

quote: Chandeliers are marvels of drop-dead showiness, the jewellery of architecture.
name: Peter York

quote: For a long time, nobody had figured out Information Architecture, so we all just made stuff up.
name: Jeffrey Zeldman

quote: Architecture is art, nothing else.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Great architecture of the past was always clear. SFMOMA is still a simple building to understand.
name: Mario Botta

quote: Escape from the architecture ghetto is one of the major drivers and has been from the very beginning.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Every building is a prototype. No two are alike.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: Trying to describe something musical is like dancing to architecture, it's really difficult.
name: Robert Palmer

quote: Architecture begins where engineering ends.
name: Walter Gropius

quote: They can do without architecture who have no olives nor wines in the cellar.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Istanbul is inspiring because it has its own code of architecture, literature, poetry, music.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: Those who look for the laws of Nature as a support for their new works collaborate with the creator.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: To provide meaningful architecture is not to parody history but to articulate it.
name: Daniel Libeskind

quote: Bridges are perhaps the most invisible form of public architecture.
name: Bruce Jackson

quote: Architecture is the will of an epoch translated into space.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Architecture should be rooted in the past, and yet be part of our own time and forward looking.
name: Moshe Safdie

quote: Form follows function.
name: Louis Sullivan

quote: The difference between good and bad architecture is the time you spend on it.
name: David Chipperfield

quote: I call architecture frozen music.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Color in certain places has the great value of making the outlines and structural planes seem more energetic.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: I would like my architecture to inspire people to use their own resources, to move into the future.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Architecture has joined the world of fashion, but fashion is passing and architecture is timeless.
name: Moshe Safdie

quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: A lasting architecture has to have roots.
name: I. M. Pei

quote: For me, architecture is the means, not the end. It's a means of making different life forms possible.
name: Bjarke Ingels

quote: In any architecture, there is an equity between the pragmatic function and the symbolic function.
name: Michael Graves

quote: The team architecture means setting up an organization that helps people produce that great work in teams.
name: Jay Chiat

quote: Cities are the greatest creations of humanity.
name: Daniel Libeskind

quote: Nothing requires the architect's care more than the due proportions of buildings.
name: Vitruvius

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Wherever technology reaches its real fulfillment, it transcends into architecture.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: All architecture has a public nature, I believe, so I would like to make a public space.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: It is not with architecture that one can disseminate any political ideology.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: The more centralized the power, the less compromises need to be made in architecture.
name: Peter Eisenman

quote: Each new situation requires a new architecture.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: No architecture is so haughty as that which is simple.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Architecture depends on facts, but its real field of activity lies in the realm of the significance.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Half of architecture students are women, and you see respected, established female architects all the time.
name: Zaha Hadid

quote: Architecture is not merely national but clearly has local ties in that it is rooted in the earth.
name: Alvar Aalto

quote: For me, architecture is not just creating a space to protect people but to make them dream as well.
name: Mario Botta

quote: The frightening thought that what you draw may become a building makes for reasoned lines.
name: Saul Steinberg

quote: Not many architects have the luxury to reject significant things.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: There's nothing Dutch about my architecture.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Architecture is a ride - a physical ride and an intellectual ride.
name: Antoine Predock

quote: The work of art shows people new directions and thinks of the future. The house thinks of the present.
name: Adolf Loos

quote: I'm drawn to furniture design as complete architecture on a minor scale.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: Talking about music is like dancing about architecture.
name: Steve Martin

quote: In architecture the idea degenerated. Design allows a more direct and pleasurable route.
name: Charles Eames

quote: Architecture struck me between the eye and the eyeball.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: If people want to see Beaux-Arts, it's fine with me. I'm interested in good architecture as anybody else.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: I haven't really got a green thumb, but I love gardens and their architecture.
name: Hubert de Givenchy

quote: I see music as fluid architecture.
name: Joni Mitchell

quote: Of all the lessons most relevant to architecture today, Japanese flexibility is the greatest.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: I don't know why I've always been so captivated by architecture.
name: Tim Gunn

quote: I don't believe in morality in architecture.
name: Michael Graves

quote: Architecture is definitely a political act.
name: Peter Eisenman

quote: There is a profound ethic to architecture which is different from the other arts.
name: Moshe Safdie

quote: Architecture is a special kind of career that showcases the accumulations of culture, time, and history.
name: Ma Yansong

quote: There is little in the architecture of a city that is more beautifully designed than a tree.
name: Jaime Lerner

quote: We build buildings which are terribly restless. And buildings don't go anywhere. They shouldn't be restless.
name: Minoru Yamasaki

quote: I've always been attracted to classic patterns in architecture, music and drama.
name: Robert Wilson

quote: My hope is that light, flexible architecture might bring about a new and open society.
name: Frei Otto

quote: In art school, it was about feeling. In architecture school, it was about ideas.
name: Elizabeth Diller

quote: The rules of navigation never navigated a ship. The rules of architecture never built a house.
name: Thomas Reid

quote: I've always seen architecture as a healing art, not just as a beautification art.
name: James Polshek

quote: I have designed the most buildings of any living American architect.
name: Alexander Jackson Davis

quote: The principle of the Gothic architecture is infinity made imaginable.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: On inspection, Gaudi's architecture isn't whimsical at all.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: London, from the architecture to the culture to the fashion to the accents, feels like it's a special place.
name: G-Eazy

quote: I love architecture.
name: Chris Pine

quote: I've gone to school for business, for design, for architecture.
name: Venus Williams

quote: Not yesterday, not tomorrow, only today can be given form. Only this architecture creates.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: I am involved in the architecture of space.
name: James Turrell

quote: I feel I can handle the architecture of dance as well as anybody.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: The visual architecture of 'Biutiful' is the most sophisticated of all the films I have directed.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I'm very interested in architecture.
name: Nikki Sixx

quote: The substance of fictional architecture is not bricks and mortar but evanescent consciousness.
name: John Updike

quote: I don't really get into architecture in the hotel room. But maybe a little Feng Shui here and there.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: What people want, above all, is order.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Victorian architecture in the United States was copied straight from England.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: The logic of Palladian architecture presented an aesthetic formula which could be applied universally.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: The Egyptian contribution to architecture was more concerned with remembering the dead than the living.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Georgian architecture respected the scale of both the individual and the community.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: I do speak Mandarin, and I also relate to the hunger that China has for culture and architecture and style.
name: Vera Wang

quote: Clothing has been called intimate architecture. We want to go beyond that.
name: Issey Miyake

quote: We all love musical architecture; there's no doubt about that.
name: Levon Helm

quote: The building of the architecture of a novel - the craft of it - is something I never tire of.
name: John Irving

quote: If I weren't involved with food, I'd be working in architecture. Design is that critical to me.
name: Alice Waters

quote: The loftier the building, the deeper must the foundation be laid.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Japanese architecture is traditionally based on wooden structures that need renovating on a regular basis.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Architecture is politics.
name: Mitch Kapor

quote: I love architecture, but I learned early on that architects just don't make a lot of money.
name: Shahid Khan

quote: Architecture was pretty much the sexiest thing to be doing from 1700-1800.
name: Kevin McCloud

quote: I'd like to do a lot of things - whether in design or architecture or business.
name: Caroline Wozniacki

quote: Church architecture describes visually the idea of the sacred, which is a fundamental need of man.
name: Mario Botta

quote: There is still a real need for good quality architecture, not paper architecture, but the real stuff.
name: Peter Zumthor

quote: I have no requirements for a style of architecture.
name: Michael Graves

quote: The dialogue of architecture has been centered too long around the idea of truth.
name: Michael Graves

quote: You can never draw enough or read enough - reading about architecture, in other words.
name: Michael Graves

quote: The oldest book I have is a treatise on architecture from the 17th century.
name: Michael Graves

quote: Form follows profit is the aesthetic principle of our times.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Of course I know very little about architecture, and the older I get the less I know.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Architecture is a slow business, and city planning even slower.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Architecture is always political.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: I search for surprise in my architecture. A work of art should cause the emotion of newness.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: It was the drawing that led me to architecture, the search for light and astonishing forms.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Painting, sculpture and architecture are finished, but the art habit continues.
name: Robert Smithson

quote: I like to think about machines and technology in relation to landscape and architecture.
name: Antoine Predock

quote: I am immersed in architecture all day, working in my office or teaching.
name: Peter Eisenman

quote: You don't need to spend a lot of money on stuff when you have amazing architecture.
name: Nate Berkus

quote: The architecture of a story can be a little bit different if it's a true story.
name: Joel Coen

quote: I don't find Hollywood interesting, so I'm thinking of studying architecture instead.
name: Hayden Christensen

quote: I loved medieval architecture when I was very small; I don't know why.
name: Andrew Lloyd Webber

quote: I have a preference for rough architecture, real, inexpensive, unfinished.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: I went from fashion to glass in 1995, and I'm very interested in architecture.
name: John Rocha

quote: I want to explore my design philosophy in different mediums, and I'm very interested in architecture.
name: John Rocha

quote: I've always been interested in art, architecture, color.
name: Lee Radziwill

quote: The intellectual architecture means focusing on doing great work instead of focusing on agency politics.
name: Jay Chiat

quote: Whenever we witness art in a building, we are aware of an energy contained by it.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Architecture doesn't come from theory. You don't think your way through a building.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Does an architecture to assuage the spirit have a place?
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: The new architecture of transparency and lightness comes from Japan and Europe.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: The way of architecture is the quiet voice that underlies it and has guided it from the beginning.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Vitality is radiated from exceptional art and architecture.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: I love architecture almost as much as I love my musicals.
name: Cameron Mackintosh

quote: Architecture aims at Eternity.
name: Christopher Wren

quote: Architecture is changing faster than some other professions.
name: Moshe Safdie

quote: Don't clap too hard - it's a very old building.
name: John Osborne

quote: Ultimately, the artistic part of architecture has always interested me.
name: Ma Yansong

quote: I'm trying to create architecture as landscape. But I'm not copying nature.
name: Ma Yansong

quote: I think architecture should be a stage, not something too material - more of an environment, not a product.
name: Ma Yansong

quote: I would have liked maybe to be in architecture or painting, something connected to the fine arts.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Technological considerations are of great importance to architecture and cities in the informational society.

quote: I am exhausted by traditional memoir. I am exhausted by the architecture of the conventional novel.
name: David Shields

quote: I never talked about architecture with my father, which I regret.
name: Bernard Tschumi

quote: Chicago is a city built on architecture, and there are plenty of buildings to scale.
name: Andrew Shaffer

quote: The Internet has created an incredible democratization of the architecture industry.
name: Cameron Sinclair

quote: I like to play with architecture! It's my favorite game.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: I think architecture has to be a gift.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: My architecture is the architecture of survival.
name: Frei Otto

quote: Architecture, by definition, is always standing still.
name: Elizabeth Diller

quote: Architecture has been male-dominated forever, and I am a grateful beneficiary of the women's movement.
name: Elizabeth Diller

quote: When I was studying architecture in the 1970s, it was intellectually bankrupt.
name: Elizabeth Diller

quote: I was always really geeky about design and buildings. Always into architecture as a kid.
name: Aldis Hodge

quote: 'Clothespin' was the first city monument on a large scale that could compete with the architecture around it.
name: Claes Oldenburg

quote: I think the artistic side of architecture was natural to me. My mother was an artist and a poet.
name: I. M. Pei

quote: Architecture must not do violence to space or its neighbors.
name: I. M. Pei

quote: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture.
name: Martin Mull

quote: Architecture, of all the arts, is the one which acts the most slowly, but the most surely, on the soul.
name: Ernest Dimnet

quote: In Los Angeles, by the time you're 35, you're older than most of the buildings.
name: Delia Ephron

quote: In writing 'The Humans,' I obsessed over the financial district and the architecture.
name: Stephen Karam

quote: The secret of good architecture is having more than meets the eye.
name: Annabelle Selldorf

quote: People kind of tend to mystify design and architecture by suggesting you need to train.
name: Marc Newson

quote: My interest in architecture has always been sculptural. Most of my photography is of architecture.
name: Parker Stevenson

quote: I think architecture, to be really intense and fulfilling, doesn't have to be large.
name: Steven Holl

quote: There will never be great architects or architecture without great patrons.
name: Edwin Lutyens

quote: In architecture, Palladio is the game. It means hard thought all through - if it is labored, it fails.
name: Edwin Lutyens

quote: An important work of architecture will create polemics.
name: Richard Meier

quote: Architecture is not a profession for the faint-hearted, the weak-willed, or the short-lived.
name: Martin Filler

quote: Truly great architecture always transcends its stated function, sometimes in unanticipated ways.
name: Martin Filler

quote: To make architecture with any real value is a massive challenge.
name: Thomas Heatherwick

quote: Architecture tends to consume everything else, it has become one's entire life.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: If a building becomes architecture, then it is art.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: I love the South Bank: every era of architecture is there, and you can stop, look, and listen.
name: Abi Morgan

quote: In fact, it will be very easy to climb the building because of its shape and architecture.
name: Alain Robert

quote: I love art in general - architecture, anything creative.
name: Matthew Ramsey

quote: Working off one genius sketch is not the way great architecture should be made.
name: Joshua Prince-Ramus

quote: Architecture is by definition a very collaborative process.
name: Joshua Prince-Ramus

quote: A city building, you experience when you walk; a suburban building, you experience when you drive.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: I strive for an architecture from which nothing can be taken away.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: The American attitude towards efficiency and execution should always underlie architecture.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: I take a lot from everywhere. I take from music, architecture, novels, and plays. Anywhere that hits you.
name: Alex Winter

quote: I quit college. I was studying architecture for about a year.
name: Barry Mann

quote: I love Sutton House in Clapton, a beautiful example of Tudor architecture.
name: Sharon Horgan

quote: I don't think architecture is radical. How can something that takes years and costs millions be radical?
name: David Chipperfield

name: David Chipperfield

name: Malcolm Wallop

quote: I don't build because I am an architect. I can make true architecture because I do not build.
name: Leon Krier

name: Iain McGilchrist

quote: Every song, the title dictates the architecture of the song.
name: Sammy Cahn

quote: Architecture was always the plan. I always figured I'd just do theater on the side.
name: Michael Lomenda

quote: Princeton is a sublime undergraduate university. It has a good architecture school.
name: Emilio Ambasz

quote: Revived in this country the long forgotten beauties of Gothic architecture.
name: James Wyatt

quote: I love '70s organic architecture. I am very influenced by the time when I grew up.
name: Alexandre de Betak

quote: As a designer, the mission with which we have been charged is simple: providing space at the right cost.
name: Harry von Zell

quote: I am but an architectural composer.
name: Alexander Jackson Davis

quote: In L.A., cinema and television might be seen as more interesting places for architecture than ever before.
name: Neil Denari

quote: In general, Tor architecture is not suited for protecting anonymity of long-term, popular web services.
